message.body: How's zona?
So good! I hiked 10 miles today. How was last night/seeing Johnny today? Hope you got to catch up on your sleep this morning
That's awesome! And last night was aight, just chilled. And it was really nice seeing Johnny actually (: and hag only 3 hours
Are you for reaaaaal? Whatd she say yo?
She means well, I just think that next yr is a disaster waiting to happen if she keeps that up
I know, it's really pissing me off that she's being so judgmental when nothing is even affecting her. I hope everything goes well with your mom tomorrow
though, definitely call me if you need to talk! And we should skype at some pt during the wk
Oh def, I'm kinda chillin now but like Monday or Tuesday. And yeahhh like if it affected her id get it, or if we pressured her, but idk dude
Yeah I probably can't skype until Tuesday, but I'll hit you up soon! And we'll figure out this whole living situation thing when we get back. Have fun tonight!
God yes this needs to be put in order, like idk what to do at this point. Def hit me up Tuesday ish tho
Hehehehhe happy birfday Maddie! You're 18, finally :P not on your wall cuz of Gabriel haha. Ily and have fun in Minnesota!!
Hahaha ily too, thank youuuu! I'll hit you up Tuesday about skype
For sure (: have fun in MN! Have an awesome bday!
thank youuuu! feel free to come visit for a few days this summer, apparently my aunt may be able to sneak my friends onto her flight attendant pass. Haha
Haha dude that's legit! Well talk about it when we're back! Blah I miss Berkeley
we'll talk about that later
Me too, it's nice to have space and stuff here but I miss everybody! Have you heard from alex? Was he hanging out with you guys Friday night?
Nah he left early, and no I don't think I'll be seeing him over break. I'm just gonna chill and catch up on sleep and such
That sounds like what I'll be doing this week haha. I'm really glad things went well with Johnny though! Miss youuu, I'm excited to talk to you about eve
rything soon
Same same (: just wanna be back in Berkeley heh
I know, me too. I was gonna go to etd with Vanessa and then we realized it was Saturday, not Sunday, and I can't even fucking go. I can't wait to get bac
Ohhh that sucks :/
k, wouldn't mind rolling or hitting up some coop parties that first weekend in April!
Yeah for sure, sorry I'm talking to my mom right now but I'll hit you up later,
Haha wrong person?
No was just saying that's why I haven't responded
Oh okay, my bad. How was seeing your mom?
It was good, just talked and smoked and watching movies and eating
